Articles.Content: I don't know if such a mod exists, or if it would be easy to do if there's not, but, I don't like that you can still see what is going on with probes that have no communication. I would like if when a probe had no communication, all you see is grey-static or 'color bar' no signal screen. Does such a mod exist, or could it be created? Also, I remember there WAS a signal delay mod, making piloting outside of Kerbin SOI very difficult for unmanned probes. Does it still exist?
Not sure if RemoteTech is what you're looking for. It has everything from delays to antenna pointing. Personally I consider it being one of the most difficult and complex component in RO...
If it has delays, it might be, but I'm pretty sure you can still see non-connected craft. (Can RT auto-point?)
It can but you have to pre-program it on the flight computer
